mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TCORONA /* insertCorona as MainController */ (CITY, DEF_CNT, INC_DEC, DEATH_CNT, ISOL_ING_CNT, ISOL_CLEAR_CNT, OVER_FLOW_CNT, LOCAL_OCC_CNT, STD_DAY, INSERT_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (#{city, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{incDec, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{deathCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{isolIngCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{isolClearCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{overFlowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{localOccCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{stdDay, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT /* selectCorona as MainController */ A.CITY, A.DEF_CNT, A.INC_DEC, A.DEATH_CNT, A.ISOL_ING_CNT, A.ISOL_CLEAR_CNT, A.OVER_FLOW_CNT, A.LOCAL_OCC_CNT, A.STD_DAY, A.OVER_FLOW_CNT + A.LOCAL_OCC_CNT AS INF_CNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY LOCAL_OCC_CNT) AS RANK FROM TCORONA A WHERE TO_CHAR(A.INSERT_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24mi') >= (SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(B.INSERT_DATE - 1/24/60), 'yyyymmddhh24mi') FROM TCORONA B) GROUP BY A.CITY, A.DEF_CNT, A.INC_DEC, A.DEATH_CNT, A.ISOL_ING_CNT, A.ISOL_CLEAR_CNT, A.OVER_FLOW_CNT, A.LOCAL_OCC_CNT, A.STD_DAY ORDER BY RANK DESC

SELECT /* selectCoronaDate as MainController */ CITY, CASE WHEN GAP = 0 THEN TO_CHAR(GAP) WHEN GAP < 0 THEN TO_CHAR(ABS(GAP)) || '▼' ELSE TO_CHAR(ABS(GAP)) || '▲' END AS DIFF_CNT, DEF_CNT, INC_DEC, DEATH_CNT, ISOL_ING_CNT, ISOL_CLEAR_CNT, OVER_FLOW_CNT, LOCAL_OCC_CNT, STD_DAY, INF_CNT, RANK FROM (SELECT (SELECT MAX(C.OVER_FLOW_CNT + C.LOCAL_OCC_CNT) FROM TCORONA C WHERE C.INSERT_DATE > TO_DATE(#{date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyymmdd') AND C.INSERT_DATE < TO_DATE(#{date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyymmdd') + 1) - (SELECT MAX(B.OVER_FLOW_CNT + B.LOCAL_OCC_CNT) FROM TCORONA B WHERE B.INSERT_DATE > TO_DATE(#{date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyymmdd') - 1 AND B.INSERT_DATE < TO_DATE(#{date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyymmdd') ) AS GAP, A.CITY, A.DEF_CNT, A.INC_DEC, A.DEATH_CNT, A.ISOL_ING_CNT, A.ISOL_CLEAR_CNT, A.OVER_FLOW_CNT, A.LOCAL_OCC_CNT, A.STD_DAY, A.OVER_FLOW_CNT + A.LOCAL_OCC_CNT AS INF_CNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY LOCAL_OCC_CNT) AS RANK FROM TCORONA A WHERE A.INSERT_DATE > TO_DATE(#{date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyymmdd') AND A.INSERT_DATE < TO_DATE(#{date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyymmdd') + 1 GROUP BY A.CITY, A.DEF_CNT, A.INC_DEC, A.DEATH_CNT, A.ISOL_ING_CNT, A.ISOL_CLEAR_CNT, A.OVER_FLOW_CNT, A.LOCAL_OCC_CNT, A.STD_DAY ORDER BY RANK DESC)
SELECT /* selectCoronaData as MainController */ COUNT(1) AS COUNT FROM TCORONA A WHERE A.INSERT_DATE > TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT TO_CHAR(A.INSERT_DATE, 'MM/DD') AS DAY, (A.OVER_FLOW_CNT + A.LOCAL_OCC_CNT) AS DAY_CORONA, 0 AS DAY_MAX FROM TCORONA A WHERE A.CITY = '합계' AND A.INSERT_DATE > TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 7
UNION
SELECT '0' AS DAY, 0 AS DAY_CORONA, MAX(A.OVER_FLOW_CNT + A.LOCAL_OCC_CNT) AS DAY_MAX FROM TCORONA A WHERE A.CITY = '합계' AND A.INSERT_DATE > TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 7
ORDER BY 1
SELECT MAX(A.OVER_FLOW_CNT + A.LOCAL_OCC_CNT) AS DAY_MAX FROM TCORONA A WHERE A.CITY = '합계' AND A.INSERT_DATE > TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 7 ORDER BY 1
